QuestData.Title: Let Them Burn
QuestData.Description: Advance scouts report that the hozen at the Slingtail Pits are amassing with reinforcements from their tribes to the north.$B$BOur forces are gathered for battle on the ridge to the northwest. They are just waiting for you.$B$BNow is the time to show them what we are made of. Now is the time to destroy them indefinitely.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill 15 Grookin Reinforcements or Slingtail Recruits.
QuestData.RewardText: The waters were right about you, $n. Because of your efforts, this village has a future. We will not forget the lessons you've taught us, $c.
